job.title: Data Scientist (Big Data Engineer)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong><strong>Job Description...<br><br><strong><u>Required Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience in large-scale IT Project/Product delivery with at least 3 years of work experience in current data streaming, messaging, management, and database technologies</li><li>Ability to establish and always maintain effective and professional working relationships with others in the course and scope of conducting business</li><li>Excellent communication, problem-solving, and organizational skills</li><li>Strong data integrity, analytical, and multitasking skills</li><li>Graduation from an accredited four-year college or university with major coursework in Computer Science or Engineering</li><li>Experience creating producer and consumer applications with Kafka</li><li>Experience with designing and building data platforms</li><li>Experience in tuning and troubleshooting streaming/messaging platforms</li><li>Experience coding and scripting (Python, Java, Scala) and design experience</li><li>Experience with ELT methodologies and tools</li><li>Hands-on experience with AWS and/or Azure</li><li>Experience with KStreams and KSQL</li><li>Experience with designing and automating build and deployment solutions/process for data solutions</li><li>Familiarity with data visualization, warehouse, and analytics tools/platforms such as Qlick, SAS Viya, Kibana, Snowflake</li><li>Experience with streaming/messaging platforms (Kafka, MQ, RabbitMQ, Elk, Elasticsearch)</li><li>Basic knowledge of database technologies (PostgreSQL, Vertica, Redshift, etc.)</li></ul> Able to work independently</strong>
